name: DEVSATRequirementsProvider
title: Developer Satisfaction Requirements for the Provider Actor
description: Developer Satisfaction Requirements for the Provider Actor

statement.label: capstmt-1
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Provider SHALL support the CapabilityStatement metadata operation and return a valid CapabilityStatement conformant to the base FHIR specification.

statement.label: capstmt-2
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Provider SHALL support the CapabilityStatement metadata operation and return a valid CapabilityStatement that instantiates the Developer Satisfaction Provider CapabilityStatement.

statement.label: create-goal-1
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Provider SHALL support sending a conformant FHIR specification Goal create operation.

statement.label: create-goal-2
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Provider SHALL support sending a conformant FHIR specification Goal create operation with a Developer Satisfaction Goal Profile conformant payload.

statement.label: create-observation-1
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Provider SHALL support sending a conformant FHIR specification Observation create operation.

statement.label: create-observation-2
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Provider SHALL support sending a conformant FHIR specification Observation create operation with a Developer Satisfaction Observation Profile conformant payload.
